message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11,500? I really like the product and don't want to give up on it.
